variable.name: GAIN_ID

variable.value: Mood symptoms most of the time

variable.type: Functional severity of most severe mania

variable.type: Functional severity of most severe depression

variable.name: V27
variable.description: Suicidal though/behavior. (African American participants). DIGS4. Page 2
variable.value: fleeting thoughts or passive death wishes only
Acted with intent to die/serious consequences

variable.name: V28
variable.description: General impact of illness on life functioning. (African American participants). DIGS4. Page 2
variable.type: General impact of illness on life functioning
variable.value: no loss of employment or marital status
Loss of status but not disabled

variable.name: V29
variable.description: Chronicity of substance abuse. (African American participants). DIGS4. Page 2
variable.value: Brief (<2 years or <25% of years ill)
